channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Friend.tech denies report that database of over 100K users was ‘leaked’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Friend.tech has hit back at a report which suggested that its API “leaked” personal data of its users.

item.title: Thailand threatens Facebook over crypto scams and other fraudulent ads
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Thailand’s digital minister said he would seek a court order to shut Facebook in the country unless it takes action on the alleged scams.

item.title: Crypto miner Hive Digital CEO sees AI working in unison with blockchain
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Despite the competition between the two sectors, Hive Digital Technologies CEO Aydin Kilic said that blockchain and AI can work to the benefit of each other.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried will get one day in court to meet with lawyers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to a judge's order, SBF will be allowed access to one laptop and “WiFi device” for roughly seven hours while meeting with counsel in a courthouse cell block attorney room.

item.title: Coinbase takes equity stake in Circle as Centre Consortium shuts down
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Circle will take on full operational and governance responsibility after five years, thanks to increased regulatory clarity.

item.title: Central African Republic expands Sango project to land, resource tokenization
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Asset tokenization has been in the works for a year. The ambitious project has also included investor citizenship and an island in the metaverse.

item.title: Dwindling optimism for Bitcoin ETF approval to blame as weekly crypto outflows hit $55M
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Even altcoins slumped, with only Ripple's XRP and Cardano registering inflows.

item.title: Coin Center responds to US lawmakers’ request for crypto tax guidance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The crypto advocacy group’s suggestions included a de minimis exemption for crypto transactions and having the IRS provide guidance on block rewards, airdrops and hard forks.

item.title: Crypto futures and ETFs are knocking at the door: Law Decoded, Aug. 13–20.
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: SEC is likely to approve multiple applications for Ether futures exchange-traded funds simultaneously.

item.title: Bitcoin price holds $26K as derivatives data hints at end of volatility spike
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: BTC futures and options data show pro traders’ sentiment was not impacted despite last week’s 11.4% correction.

item.title: The secret to successful branding in Web3: The science of choosing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By German Ramirez
item.description: One more thing: It is not an art or magic. There is a science to branding.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Price analysis 8/21: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, SOL, DOT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and select altcoins are starting to recover, but selling at the top of each price breakout suggests that bears remain in control.

item.title: Scientists reverse-engineered the Luna flash crash using particle physics
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Some of the same techniques used to study the thermal history of the universe can be used to understand crypto crashes.

item.title: SEC charges crypto investment manager Titan with misleading advertising claims
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The case against Titan Global Capital Management is the first brought under the U.S. regulator’s 2020 revised marketing rule. It also touches on compliance issues.

item.title: Coinbase sees lukewarm demand for debt buyback, raises offer
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The United States-based crypto exchange has increased its offer for discounted debt by 3%.

item.title: Why the choice of the blockchain matters for NFT collections
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arvin Khamseh
item.description: When choosing a blockchain, consider the trade-offs and align it with your needs. Avoid risking your funds, time and community trust.

item.title: Crypto users react to death of Shiba Inu behind viral memes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The 12-year-old dog had appeared in memes with Dogecoin’s own inspiration, the Shiba Inu named Kabosu, including “Swole Doge vs. Cheems.”

item.title: Binance limits withdrawals in Europe, cites payment processor issues
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: In a since-deleted customer service message, Binance said that the failed withdrawals were caused by temporarily suspended euro transactions through SEPA.

item.title: Bitcoin speculators are underwater on 88% of their BTC bags: Research
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: A tale of two types of Bitcoin investors emerges as BTC price action separates “sensitive” speculators from seasoned hodlers.

item.title: PayPal’s new PYUSD stablecoin faces legal headwinds and ‘less functionality’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rachel Wolfson
item.description: Industry experts explain the benefits and disadvantages of PayPal’s PYUSD stablecoin.

item.title: Top UK university partners with AI startup to analyze crypto market
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Imperial College London announced a collaboration with AI startup FluidAI to tackle major issues in the crypto market such as liquidity aggregation.

item.title: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin moves $1M of ETH to Coinbase
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: On-chain data shows that Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin moved 600 ETH to U.S. exchange Coinbase amid ongoing market woes.

item.title: Convergence of AI and blockchain: Unlocking new possibilities
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Abhishek Singh
item.description: Overall, the combination of AI and blockchain represents a massive paradigm shift in modern technology and presents significant opportunities for lives and industries to improve.

item.title: Renewable energy Bitcoin mining company powers up in Sweden
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: Bitcoin mining lands another green energy data center as global powerhouse GDA sets up shop in Sweden.

item.title: Kenya forms parliamentary committee to investigate Worldcoin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The controversial crypto project’s launch has been marred into controversy, and it’s already facing investigations in nearly half a dozen countries.

item.title: Somalia bans Telegram and TikTok over misinformation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Somalia has shut down crypto-friendly messaging app Telegram and gambling site 1XBet, while cryptocurrency investments aren’t banned.

item.title: 5 strategies to mitigate side channel attacks on cryptocurrency hardware wallets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Explore strategies to prevent side-channel attacks on cryptocurrency hardware wallets, ensuring your digital investments remain secure.

item.title: Google responds to accusations of ads tracking data of children
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: After an in-depth report surfaced about YouTube advertisers potentially harvesting data from children, Google responded by saying it has “strict policies” around children’s content.

item.title: Most fear since SVB collapse — 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin traders are truly “spooked,” and sentiment crashes harder than BTC price as the shake-up from last week’s losses continues.
